newsitem.title: USA: WMS suffers temporary patent case setback.
newsitem.headline: WMS suffers temporary patent case setback.

text.p: WMS Industries Inc said Thursday a federal judge issued a temporary restraining order prohibiting its WMS Gaming unit from manufacturing, using or selling its model 401 "Nevada" slot machines.
The ruling came in a patent infringement case involving International Game Technology.

The U.S. Court of Appeals has issued an interim stay of an injunction issued by the same judge in litigation involving other machines and WMS Gaming intends to petition the Appeals Court for similar relief with respect to the Nevada machine as soon as permitted under law, the company said.
A hearing was set for Monday on a preliminary injunction sought by International Game, WMS said.
International Game shares were down 1/4 to 18-1/4 before being halted for news dissemination, while shares were down 1-3/8 at 24-1/4 Thursday.
